name: UpdateEmbedItemOnBoard
description:
Update an embed item on a Miro board.

Use this tool to update specific embed items on a Miro board. Ensure you have the required 'boards:write' scope before calling this tool. This action involves modifying the properties of an embed on the board and is subject to Level 2 rate limiting.

parameters.name: board_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the board where you want to update the item.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the board where you want to update the item.

parameters.name: embed_item_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the embed item to update on the board.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the item that you want to update.

parameters.name: embed_display_mode
parameters.description: Defines how the content in the embed item is displayed on the board. Use 'inline' for direct display and 'modal' for a modal overlay view.

value_schema.description:
Defines how the content in the embed item is displayed on the board.
`inline`: The embedded content is displayed directly on the board.
`modal`: The embedded content is displayed inside a modal overlay on the board.

parameters.name: preview_image_url
parameters.description: URL of the image used as the preview for the embedded item.

value_schema.description: URL of the image to be used as the preview image for the embedded item.

parameters.name: content_resource_url
parameters.description: A valid URL pointing to the content resource to embed in the board. Supports HTTP and HTTPS protocols.

value_schema.description: A [valid URL](https://developers.miro.com/reference/data#embeddata) pointing to the content resource that you want to embed in the board. Possible transport protocols: HTTP, HTTPS.

parameters.name: x_axis_coordinate_on_board
parameters.description: X-axis coordinate for the location of the item on the board. Defaults to `0`, representing the center of the board.

value_schema.description:
X-axis coordinate of the location of the item on the board.
By default, all items have absolute positioning to the board, not the current viewport. Default: `0`.
The center point of the board has `x: 0` and `y: 0` coordinates.

parameters.name: y_axis_coordinate
parameters.description: Y-axis coordinate of the item's location on the board. Defaults to `0`. Center of board is `y: 0`.

value_schema.description:
Y-axis coordinate of the location of the item on the board.
By default, all items have absolute positioning to the board, not the current viewport. Default: `0`.
The center point of the board has `x: 0` and `y: 0` coordinates.

parameters.name: item_height_in_pixels
parameters.description: Specify the height of the embed item in pixels.

value_schema.description: Height of the item, in pixels.

parameters.name: item_width_pixels
parameters.description: Specifies the width of the item on the board in pixels.

value_schema.description: Width of the item, in pixels.

parameters.name: parent_frame_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the parent frame for the item being updated on the board.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the parent frame for the item.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the miro API.

value_schema.description: A [valid URL](https://developers.miro.com/reference/data#embeddata) pointing to the content resource that you want to embed in the board. Possible transport protocols: HTTP, HTTPS.

parameters.name: position.x
parameters.description:
X-axis coordinate of the location of the item on the board.
By default, all items have absolute positioning to the board, not the current viewport. Default: `0`.
The center point of the board has `x: 0` and `y: 0` coordinates.

value_schema.description:
X-axis coordinate of the location of the item on the board.
By default, all items have absolute positioning to the board, not the current viewport. Default: `0`.
The center point of the board has `x: 0` and `y: 0` coordinates.

parameters.name: position.y

By default, all items have absolute positioning to the board, not the current viewport. Default: `0`.
The center point of the board has `x: 0` and `y: 0` coordinates.

value_schema.description:
